sourcesContent:
Sapiens

Yuval Noah Harari

This book is about the history of humanity from a fresh perspective with unique insights and analogies. Harari writes masterfully and simply; he has a work of art here trully. A must read for all. And with that we are all finished. Actually we are not finished. Here comes another line. Boom what happened? No one knows what happend since it is a secret

4.5

HomoDeaus

Yuval Noah Harari

4.5

The Ice At The End of The world

John Gertner

4.5
